definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和脑组织含水量作为观察指标。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: No positive reaction was found in both paragonimiasis and clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 与肺吸虫病和肝吸虫病患者血清之间未出现交叉反应。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between serum resistin levels and type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨人血清抵抗素水平与2型糖尿病的关系。

sentences.english: The immunity serum titer was mensurated by the routine ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 常规ELISA法测定免疫血清效价。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化学发光免疫分析法测血清总睾酮。

sentences.english: Vibrio cholerae 01 sero type inaba has been confirmed in some of the affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 在有些疫区已确认存在01稻叶血清型霍乱弧菌。

sentences.english: It has been reported that some human and mouse serum DNA-binding proteins were related to tumor.
sentences.chinese: 血清DNA结合蛋白质中的某些成分与肿瘤有关。

sentences.english: Result No significant difference was found in seropositivity rate among every group.
sentences.chinese: 结果各组之间血清学无显著性差异。

sentences.english: The negative serological negative conversion rate of syphilis treatment was low.
sentences.chinese: 潜伏梅毒治疗血清阴转率偏低。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method provides a reliable approach to prepare the serum containing Dracaena.
sentences.chinese: 结论本法可作为龙血竭含药血清的制备方法。

sentences.english: Malondialdehyde(MDA) consistency in rats serum was measured when performing cryotherapy by means of fluorescence method.
sentences.chinese: 采用荧光法测定大鼠冷冻前后血清MDA浓度。

sentences.english: Serum-free hormone-supplemented medium could promote cell multiplication and differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 无血清培养基能促进细胞增殖，分化和成熟。

sentences.english: Indirect competitive ELISA (icELISA) was established with this antiserum.
sentences.chinese: 用所制备的抗血清建立间接竞争ELISA方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion The nano-sized iron oxide yellow maybe has little effect on overall serum biochemical index in mice.
sentences.chinese: 结论纳米氧化铁黄对小鼠血清生化指标无显著影响。

definition: potency/titer (measure of effective concentration in virology or chemical pathology, defined in terms of potency after dilution by titration)/valence (perceived value in psychology)/valency
choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma
